Class Metadata

java.lang.Object
musicApp.models.Metadata
public class Metadata extends Object
Represents metadata associated with a song. Provides methods to retrieve details such as title, artist, genre, duration, and cover image in Base64 format.

    • Metadata

      public Metadata()
      Constructor to create a new Metadata object with default values.

  • Method Details

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()
      Retrieves the title of the song. If the title is not present in the metadata, returns "Unknown Title".
      Returns:
      The title of the song.

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle(String title)
      Sets the title of the song.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the song.

    • getArtist

      public String getArtist()
      Retrieves the artist of the song. If the artist is not present in the metadata, returns "Unknown Artist".
      Returns:
      The artist of the song.

    • setArtist

      public void setArtist(String artist)
      Sets the artist of the song.
      Parameters:
      artist - The artist of the song.

    • getGenre

      public String getGenre()
      Retrieves the genre of the song. If the genre is not present in the metadata, returns "Unknown Genre".
      Returns:
      The genre of the song.

    • setGenre

      public void setGenre(String genre)
      Sets the genre of the song.
      Parameters:
      genre - The genre of the song.

    • getDuration

      public javafx.util.Duration getDuration()
      Retrieves the duration of the song. If the duration is not available, returns a duration of 0 seconds.
      Returns:
      The duration of the media item as a Duration object.

    • setDuration

      public void setDuration(javafx.util.Duration duration)
      Sets the duration of the song.
      Parameters:
      duration - The duration of the song.

    • getCover

      public byte[] getCover()
      Retrieves the cover image in Base64 encoding, if present. If the cover is not available, returns an empty Optional.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the cover image in Base64 format or empty if not available.

    • setCover

      public void setCover(byte[] cover)
      Sets the cover image in Base64 encoding.
      Parameters:
      cover - The cover image in Base64 format.
